00073 class EGS_POLYGON_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_TriangleShape : public EGS_SurfaceShape {
00074 
00075 public:
00076 
00077     EGS_TriangleShape(const vector<EGS_Float> &points, const string &Name="",
00078                       EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00079     EGS_TriangleShape(const EGS_Float *points, const string &Name="",
00080                       EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00081     ~EGS_TriangleShape() {};
00082     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00083         EGS_Float eta_a = sqrt(rndm->getUniform());
00084         EGS_Float eta_b = eta_a*rndm->getUniform();
00085         eta_a = 1 - eta_a;
00086         return EGS_Vector(xo + ax*eta_a + bx*eta_b,
00087                           yo + ay*eta_a + by*eta_b,
00088                           0);
00089     };
00090 
00091 protected:
00092 
00093     EGS_Float xo, yo, ax, ay, bx, by;
00094 
00095 };
00096 
00097 
00117 class EGS_POLYGON_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_PolygonShape : public EGS_SurfaceShape {
00118 
00119 public:
00120 
00121     EGS_PolygonShape(const vector<EGS_Float> &points, const string &Name="",
00122                      EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00123     ~EGS_PolygonShape() {
00124         if (n > 0) {
00125             for (int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00126                 delete triangle[j];
00127             }
00128             delete [] triangle;
00129             delete table;
00130         }
00131     };
00132     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00133         int j = table->sampleBin(rndm);
00134         return triangle[j]->getPoint(rndm);
00135     };
00136 
00137 protected:
00138 
00139     int  n;  // number of triangles
00140     EGS_TriangleShape **triangle;
00141     EGS_AliasTable    *table;
00142 
00143 };
00144 
00145 #endif
